1177430.name: Immanence
1177430.description:
You wake up in the city.

Some unknown divine entity is here and it's not good. Reality around you becomes increasingly deranged and fuzzy.

Who is this man that built a supercomputer capable to send you to other realities in his own appartment?
Who is this girl that sends you strange messages all the time?
What's going on here?

This game is a 2D psychological thriller with adventure game mechanics and focus on the story and atmosphere.

Features

  • Use your phone to read social media, messages from other people and solve puzzles.
  • Surreal puzzles involving moving between realities.
  • Immersive soundtrack that features tracks created by artists Nyctophiliac, Gouldenberg, Круги под глазами.
  • Original pizel art visual style.

English text editing and proofreading is done by Black Cat.
1177430.supported_languages:
英语*, 俄语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
